statement.name: INSERT_SMAKJM
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMAKJM (NROKJM, NROUSR, NOMKJM, STDKJM, NROPQK, CRDPQK, NROCMP, NROCST, BGNKJM, SLDKJM, MAXKJM, FCHKJM, NRORSL, NRORBR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAKJM
statement.sql:
UPDATE SMAKJM SET NROUSR=?, NOMKJM=?, STDKJM=?, NROPQK=?, CRDPQK=?, NROCMP=?, NROCST=?, BGNKJM=?, SLDKJM=?, MAXKJM=?
WHERE NROKJM=? and NRORSL=?

statement.name: DELETE_SMAKJM
statement.sql: DELETE FROM SMAKJM WHERE NROKJM=? and NRORSL=?
